description: a(n) = maximal value for number of divisors of C(n,k) for k=0..n.
example: If n=20, then the number of divisors of C[ 20,k ] is one of {1,6,8,16,24,40,48,64,80}, so a[ 20 ]=80.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {maxv = 0; for (k=0, n, maxv = max(numdiv(binomial(n, k)), maxv)); maxv;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 15 2013
author: _Labos Elemer_
